SELECT a.aprv_sn ,a.aprv_no ,a.tmplt_cd ,a.cust_id ,a.emp_id ,e.emp_name ,to_char(a.atrz_dmnd_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS atrz_dmnd_dt ,to_char(a.atrz_cmptn_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS atrz_cmptn_dt ,a.aprv_ttl ,a.prgrs_stts_cd FROM approval a INNER JOIN client c ON a.cust_id = c.cust_id INNER JOIN employee e ON a.emp_id = e.emp_id WHERE a.cust_id = #{custId}

SELECT a.aprv_sn ,a.aprv_no ,a.tmplt_cd ,a.emp_id ,e.emp_name ,to_char(a.atrz_dmnd_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS atrz_dmnd_dt ,to_char(a.atrz_cmptn_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS atrz_cmptn_dt ,a.aprv_ttl ,a.prgrs_stts_cd FROM approval a INNER JOIN employee e ON a.emp_id = e.emp_id INNER join approval_line l ON a.aprv_sn = l.aprv_sn WHERE 1=1
AND a.prgrs_stts_cd IN (3,4)
AND l.aprv_se_cd IN (1,3)
AND l.prgrs_stts_cd IN (2) AND (l.emp_id = #{empId} OR l.emp_id = (SELECT emp_id FROM proxy WHERE 1=1 AND agt_id = #{empId}
AND bgng_dt <= sysdate AND end_dt > sysdate))
AND a.atrz_dmnd_dt >= to_date(#{dmndStartDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND a.atrz_dmnd_dt < to_date(#{dmndEndDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1
ORDER BY a.aprv_sn DESC

SELECT l.aprv_sn ,l.aprv_line_sn ,l.emp_id ,e.emp_profile ,e.emp_name ,p.jbgd_nm ,d.dept_nm ,l.aprv_order ,to_char(l.atrz_dt, 'yyyy-mm-dd') atrz_dt ,l.atrz_opnn ,l.prgrs_stts_cd ,l.aprv_se_cd ,l.dcrb_yn ,l.prsl_dt ,c.coco_nm ,s.img_data FROM approval_line l INNER JOIN employee e ON l.emp_id = e.emp_id INNER JOIN position p ON e.jbgd_id = p.jbgd_id INNER JOIN department d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id INNER JOIN common_code c ON l.aprv_se_cd = c.coco_id LEFT JOIN approval_sign s ON l.sign_sn = s.sign_sn WHERE 1=1 AND c.cocog_id = 'ALT' AND l.aprv_se_cd IN (1,2,3,6) AND aprv_sn = #{aprv_sn} ORDER BY l.aprv_order DESC

SELECT l.aprv_sn ,l.aprv_line_sn ,l.emp_id ,e.emp_profile ,e.emp_name ,p.jbgd_nm ,d.dept_nm ,l.aprv_order ,l.atrz_dt ,l.atrz_opnn ,l.prgrs_stts_cd ,l.aprv_se_cd ,l.dcrb_yn ,l.prsl_dt ,c.coco_nm FROM approval_line l INNER JOIN employee e ON l.emp_id = e.emp_id INNER JOIN position p ON e.jbgd_id = p.jbgd_id INNER JOIN department d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id INNER JOIN common_code c ON l.aprv_se_cd = c.coco_id WHERE 1=1 AND c.cocog_id = 'ALT' AND l.aprv_se_cd IN (4,5) AND aprv_sn = #{aprv_sn}
SELECT de.aprv_sn ,de.dept_id ,d.dept_nm FROM destination de INNER JOIN department d ON de.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE de.aprv_sn= #{aprv_sn}
